snippet: The president will seek to show that he has taken unilateral actions on the economy in the face of the legislative stalemate with Republicans.
abstract: Pres Obama's reelection campaign will continue his offensive against the unpopular Congress, focusing on the theme of economic justice for ordinary Americans; strategy represents a wholesale makeover of the young senator who won the presidency in 2008 by promising to change the culture of Washington, DC, rise above the partisan fray and seek compromises.
lead_paragraph: The president will seek to show that he has taken unilateral actions on the economy in the face of the legislative stalemate with Republicans.

headline.seo: Obama to Target Congress in 2012 Re-election Campaign
headline.main: Obama to Turn Up Attacks on Congress in Campaign
headline.print_headline: Obama Strategy For '12 Election: Attack Congress
